GSD.description:
ceph: blocklist the kclient when receiving corrupted snap trace

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit 66ec619e4591f8350f99c5269a7ce160cccc7a7c. For more details please see the references link.
